title: The Unicorn Adventures: How a Young Boy Finds God's Love
description: How does a young boy, who wanders away from a family picnic, find God's love through a magical forest, a beautiful Unicorn, and other forest friends? Read this book to your children and let them delight in the beautiful drawings showing the tale of Christopher and his animal friends and adventures and how he learns many valuable lessons about giving and receiving love though friendship; being brave and true; and the power of God's love. A portion of the profits from the sale of The Unicorn Adventures will be donated to the Unicorn Foundation to fund charitable endeavors.
author: Thomas Rosa
